welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Indian Trail! Known for its charming small-town atmosphere and friendly community, we invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories here."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Charlotte Douglas Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Charlotte Douglas Airport serves mainly American Airlines flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Charlotte Douglas Airport serves mainly Delta and United Airlines flights.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Charlotte Douglas Airport serves mainly Southwest and JetBlue flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Concord-Padgett Regional Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: A dedicated terminal for cargo flights, equipped with state-of-the-art facilities for efficient handling and storage of goods.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rock Hill Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rock Hill Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
